title: 820-00840-A
message:
Hi, I have a problem with this board. when I turn on the fan starts and nothing happens, the cpu gets a little hot and I have 
PPVCCGT_S0G
PPVCCCPU_S0G
PPVCCSA_S0G which are shorted

title: 820-00840-A
message:
Probably no short at all.
CPU power rails have very low resistance as normal; just compare with good board.

Do you get any voltage at  PPVCCCPU_S0G ?

title: 820-00840-A
message:
That is good value.
Check if you have USB activity.
Caps Lock LED reacts?

Any history fault available?

title: 820-00840-A
message:
No green light
The mac has been in apple assistance several times
They changed motherboard hd keyboard. The customer told me that sometimes the folder with the question mark appears

title: 820-00840-A
message:
When board boots,  PPVCCCPU_S0G  pass through 0.9V till 0.6V in the first 10s.
Check if is your case.
Did you try PRAM reset?

title: 820-00840-A
message: No idea what is that picture...

title: 820-00840-A
message: That's the display. Of the 20 10 minutes it shows those green spots

title: 820-00840-A
message: Try another LCD assembly, test external video.
